sub_title: Senior Test Automation Engineer at ASML, MSc.,ISTQB ST,ISTQB TTA
summary:
•	Leading a team of seniors and juniors’ qualification engineers
•	Establish a test process and follow up to make sure that all the team are aligned 
•	Creating the test strategy and test plan 
•	Follow up with the team  all projects status and if there are any stopper issues they face
•	Ensure testing is performed in alignment with agreed Test Strategy for Agile Projects)
•	Manage testing execution (Verify System testing quality, coordinate UAT and regression testing, Document test cases) 
•	Reporting on testing, QA, progress, risks and mitigations
•	Identify and record any problem relating to the product process and quality system, and initiate, recommend or provide solutions to the quality issues 
•	Allocating the teams per project
•	Interact closely with the entire development team, making sure issues are clearly communicated and tracked
•	Review Business Customer specification for the system and add missing business flows.
•	Continuously improve the quality assurance processes
•	Help developing and maintain the test scripts using Selenium and robot framework
•	Help developing and maintaining test scenarios using (BDD) Behavior Driven Development by using Gherkin Langue.
•	Perform Security Vulnerabilities’ Assessments. 
•	Perform Performance, Load and Stress testing.

projects.title: BankNet with different channels- Retail:
projects.description:
	Internet Channel: Internet channel of the BankNet Product, which  allows the entire line of services available from BankNet to be accessed from the Internet

	IVR Channel: Phone – Interactive Voice Response (IVR) channel of the BankNet Product, which allows the entire line of services available from BankNet to be accessed from a phone.
                                                   
	Kiosk Channel: Kiosk channel of the BankNet Product, which allows the entire line of services available from BankNet to be accessed from a Kiosk.

	SMS Channel: SMS channel of the BankNet Product, which  allows the entire line of services available from BankNet to be accessed from the mobile to send and revives messages with all transactions ,inquires and requests that customer wants to process

	Mobile  Channel: Mobile channel of the BankNet Product, which  allows the entire line of services available from BankNet to be accessed from the mobile device

	Notification services channel: subscription in notification alert channels that enable the customer to be notified by any change on his accounts, Cards(Credit/Debit), Loans  Balance

authors.headline: Senior Test Automation Engineer at ASML, MSc.,ISTQB ST,ISTQB TTA

profile_positions.description:
Analysis and design
Review Business Customer specification for the system and add missing business flows.
Implementation and execution
Develop and maintain test scenarios using (BDD) Behavior Driven Development by using Gherkin language.
Perform Security Vulnerabilities’ Assessments.
Perform Performance, Load and Stress testing.
Automate the web applications using Selenium Web-driver and Robot Framework.
profile_positions.title: Senior Qualification Engineer

profile_positions.description:
My Duties
Planning and control
Planning: Verifying the mission of testing, defining the objectives, Establish Test Plan and make estimation 
Control: Measuring and analyzing results

Analysis and design
Evaluate functional requirements and use-cases to create functional test cases.

Implementation and execution
Develop and maintain test scenarios, test cases, traceability matrix and scripts if needed
Identify the critical paths (different test scenarios) for the purpose of regression/system testing.

Applying different types of Testing
Functional testing: Security testing, Interoperability testing, Black Box Testing
Non-functional testing: Usability, reliability, maintainability, portability
Testing related to changes: Confirmation testing (retesting) and regression testing

Use defect-tracking tool to upload the defects in the application,

Evaluating exit criteria and reporting
Checking test logs against exit criteria
Writing a test summary report 

Test closure activities
Collecting and consolidating data on the testing project. 
Lessons learned.
profile_positions.title: Quality Control TL

volunteer_experiences.description:
Umrah4Them (اعملهم عمره) 

إعملهم عمرة برنامج خيري بيساعد الناس انها تقدر تعمل عمرة لواحد متوفي, بنجمع طلبات العمرة عن المتوفين و المتطوع بيختار متوفي و يعمله عمرة.

Umrah4Them is a charity program that helps people doing Umrah for their deceased relatives who were not being able to do it during their life. All you have to do , install the app from the play store then make registration and finally you can add a Request.The volunteers will pick the request up and perform the Umrah for the case.

Facebook Page :https://www.facebook.com/Umrah4Them/
And to download the app : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.umrah4them.android
